title: The Zeitly Trendezvous 2/5: Christopher Plummer, Olivia Wilde, Halftime Shows, Phoebe Bridgers, Trayvon Martin
itunes:title: The Zeitly Trendezvous 2/5: Christopher Plummer, Olivia Wilde, Halftime Shows, Phoebe Bridgers, Trayvon Martin
description:
On this edition of The Zeitly Trendezvous Jack and DJ Danl discuss the passing of legendary actor Christopher Plummer, Olivia Wilde's "No Assholes" policy on sets, a Thrillist of the Best Halftime Shows, Phoebe Bridgers shares details of a trip to Marilyn Manson's house, and today would be Trayvon Martin's 26th birthday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
